story:
Billow's mission is to make a difference in women's lives by bringing them a product that allows them to REST PAIN FREE and COMFORTABLY while sleeping, relaxing and getting a massage.

Billow is based in the US and we are focused on sustainability.  Each Billow is MADE IN THE USA of DOMESTIC, ORGANIC, CHEMICAL FREE and CRUELTY FREE MATERIALS, eco-pure wool and organic cotton.


WHERE WE ARE NOW

  • The Billow pillow has been prototyped, design finalized and is patent-pending. "Billow" and the Billow logo are registered trademarks of Billow.
  • We have a USA based manufacturing partner to produce the Billow and Billow-case and have worked with them in creating a product that we're proud of.  The Billow is 100% ORGANIC, CHEMICAL and CRUELTY FREE and made of DOMESTICALLY sourced materials.

  • We have been in the market since late 2014. Our customers range from breast reconstruction patients, nursing moms and women with other sensitivity issues.  The Billow has provided relief and comfort in all of these situations. We realize we have penetrated a small portion of the population that could benefit from a Billow.
  • Even in these early stages we have received great recognition through NPR, Sirius, Women Worldwide Network, Melanie Young-Author of Getting Things Off My Chest, The Huffington Post Women in Business and The Pink Lotus Breast Center, among others.  The Billow is an amazing massage pillow-It was designed to fit a standard size massage table.  We have recently had the opportunity to expand into the spa industry by being recognized as a product in exclusive spas including The Salt Cave and Spa and The Greenbrier in White Sulphur Springs, WV and Nemacolin Woodlands Resort in Pennsylvania.

NEXT STEPS

WE NEED THE FOLLOWING TO HELP TAKE US TO THE NEXT LEVEL:

  • We need packaging design, POP (point of purchase) design and its manufacturing to qualify Billow and Billow products as an established vendor to sell into retail and Internet store fronts.
  • A marketing and distribution specialist to help spread the word about the Billow.  The increase in sales will allow us to scale our manufacturing costs (The financial costs of breast cancer can hurt just as much as the physical costs).  We want to make the Billow affordable to anyone who could benefit from a Billow!
  • Finally, we are a start-up and I have personally self-funded for the past 2 years.  We need help raising working capital help to us reach our goals.

PERKS

BILLOW PILLOW  

I understand how important rest and recovery are to healing.  I designed the Billow to address each element of a woman's desire for perfect breast, back, under arm and neck support.  Billow provides comfort to women who have had breast surgery, nursing mothers, curvy women and women with other sensitivities and who have difficulty getting comfortable.


JULES BURT FOR BILLOW LIMITED EDITION PRINT

Jules Burt is an amazing artist and fabulous friend. This signed, limited edition print represents Billow and the beauty in all women, their personal journeys with breast cancer and the lives that are touched by it. 


EYE OF THE SEA AWARENESS BRACELET
Eye of the Sea Jewelry is a reminder that we are all full of life, love and have the power and courage to change our lives and discover our own sense of calm. 

The Awareness Bracelet is made of pink agate, which rebalances mind, body and spirit, providing healing and protective energy. The Awareness bracelet is available with a silver or brass charm.

BILLOW 5-FREE NAIL POLISHES AND TREATMENTS
I realized how the little things, like getting a mani/pedi, make a big difference in helping women feel better about themselves. Billow 5-Free polish was created for women who wish to eliminate harmful chemicals from their lives and give them a little boost of confidence and happiness. The polishes and treatments have ingredients like vitamin A, biotin, calcium, ginseng and lavender to help nails grow healthy and strong.  Billow FDA approved polishes are cruelty free and made in the USA.

Nail Treatment Trio 

Billow 5-Free Polish Trio (Diva/GrayTful/Treat Me)

Billow 5-Free Polish Duo (Choose any combo from the colors below):

                                              

  Diva         Treat Me      WineDown      GrayTful        


TIMELINE


RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We feel very comfortable with the timeline above.  We have a manufacturer with the tools in place to have a Billow shipped to you in a timely manner.  However, unforeseen things happen, and there could be delays if there are significant issues with one of our manufacturing partners or shipping providers.

WHY INDIEGOGO?

Billow is a pillow that can help women sleep better, rest better and feel better.  The Indiegogo community gives us the opportunity to gain valuable feedback to make our product better based on the advice and commentary from people like you.   We think it's a smarter way to innovate and we'd like your help.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you love the Billow, but aren't ready to back us yet, please help us spread the word about Billow and the importance of getting mammograms and tested for the BRCA gene mutation, especially if there is a history of breast cancer in your family.

Billow donates a portion of all profits to breast cancer research and helping those in need.

THANK YOU’S

I want to say THANK YOU to all of the amazing women I’ve met on this journey.  You are strong, brave and beautiful and continue to inspire me. 

I also want to extend a special THANK YOU to the Barnes Agency and Mike Stryker of castinglifefilms.com for donating their time and resources to making this video possible and helping to get the word out.  

Jasmynn Allen, Dr. Toni Arceo, Ann Marie Otis and Ruth Ranson; THANK YOU for your testimonials and being a part of this video. I'm honored to have your presence in my life.  Please watch the entire video to see these amazing women and their testimonies at the end!

story:
Short Summary

Where there is a will there is a way.

Smart Moves Play Place is a hub in Barrie where young families meet, play and learn.

We have the opportunity to help foster a community of compassion and awareness for the children that visit ...  and we have the network to welcome a new family.

Our goal is to raise $50, 000 to give a Syrian family a fresh start here in Barrie.
We are working in conjunction with a Sponsorship Agreement Holder organization to ensure transparency and expediency.
We know it may be a lengthy and arduous task but we are up to the challenge.

We hope that we can count on you to support this initiative.  If a financial donation is not possible, you can still contribute by spreading the word and raising awareness.
Thank you! Together we can make a difference!

story:
Who Am I and Why Am I Asking For Your Support

Hi, I'm Monica. I am a mother, writer, visionary, community builder, moon gazer, sun goddess and earth wisdom keeper.

What if making a difference was more simple that we realize?


This modern era causes us to ceaselessly hustle for the very things that take us away from what we most desire; inner peace and human connection.

My vision is simple. 

By having the courage to honor the deepest desires of our Heart, we step onto our highest creative path.

Creativity and Leadership have the power to transform the world. 

I believe the Peace, Harmony, Balance and Connection we desire in our own lives and the world requires us to become Lionhearted so that we can face the challenges of our world and turn them into transformations that serve our deepest needs as humanity.

We are now ready for new inspired models of collaboration and I believe that a united tribe of lionhearted creatives and leaders is needed to bring great change to a world in need.


A Lionhearted Person is cultivating these qualities:

Committed to Truth.
You value Truth as a powerful catalyst for change and growth. You know that speaking your truth with love, sets you free. You stand up for truth, even if you need to roar. You are mastering saying NO so that you can say YES to your deeper truth.

Walk the Heart Path
You are stepping boldly into actualizing the dreams in your heart. You refuse to close your heart, even in the face of hurt because you know have chosen a path of love. You see vulnerability as a strength.

Cultivate Self Love
You know that Love for Self is your highest path. You are committed to giving yourself what you seek from others. You water your heart with compassion, forgiveness and acceptance. You know that loving yourself is the most powerful way to spread love and peace on the planet.

Follow the Signs
The mystery of life is revealing itself to you and you trust your intuition. You receive signs on your path as confirmation and synchronicity is occurring more and more.

In Flow
You are tuning into Earth energies and receiving guidance from Source, and your Higher Self. This connection is where you find your fuel, vision and creative inspirations. 

Committed to Self Mastery
You go deep within yourself, layer by layer learning how to shift pain into power. You take responsibility for your life and choose to be all that you are. You know the answers are within and shifting to an inner directed life.

Are Courageous
You know change is necessary to be true to your heart. You are boldly making changes in your life to reflect your authentic truth. You are releasing your desire for approval from others as you become stronger in your truth.

Reclaiming Power
You desire to be self actualized, autonomous and radiant, from the inside out. You are shifting away from victim mindset to one of power by seeing the gifts in your journey. You are tapping into the energies of the inner shaman. You are becoming more gentle, yet you feel your inner power growing.

Walking the Path of Beauty
You are more and more humbled by life and see Grace unfolding around you. You are seeing with new eyes and deeply moved by the simple everyday moments of beauty.

Desire to Serve and Express Your Inner Gifts
You are stepping onto the path of Spirit and feel moved to make a difference in your own unique way. You are beginning to seek out collaboration and community. You desire to share your inner gifts and talents for the betterment of humanity.

Embracing the Compassionate AND Fierce VOICE.
You are waking up to injustices of the world and feeling the inner lion rising to add your voice. You are fierce about protecting values that honor the basic rights of humanity. If you are a parent, you do not follow the mainstream, you understand LEGACY, you know the power of light, you choose peace through NO violence yet you are not afraid to step forward and say NO More.

Finding your Tribe
You no longer desire to "do it alone" and seek out community, collaboration, support and opportunities that benefit ALL. You are releasing relationships with love that no longer serve and finding that your soul tribe is showing up in magical ways!

It is time to awaken the Lionheart within.

It is time for lionhearted people to unite and boldly step into co-creating a world in Harmony, Balance and Peace.

There is NO other time. The time is NOW.

We are the change and Peace begins with US.

This campaign and vision has been created to share this message across the globe.

I invite you to join me!


The Visions that Changed Everything

Have you ever heard that what you loved as a child, is where your bliss can be found?

As you can see, I have a thing for Lions. For as long as I can remember, the big cats have always captivated me.

I thought it was just an innocent adoration of big cats  . . . until April 2013.

While on vacation in Maui, I had a vision.

I was in the middle of a huge life transition and I didn't want to leave Maui just yet, so I changed my ticket to stay one extra night and attend a special yoga class with the women I traveled with.

And so 2 hours before I was to jump on the plane back home, I landed on my yoga mat soaking up every last moments of Maui and this amazing teacher.

I was facing a white stucco wall when I saw The Face emerge. It was a man, perhaps African, Polynesian, Maori . . .I couldn't tel for sure. His energy was that of a shaman, a leader in his community. I watched him as he surveyed over the land, with a staff in his hand. Then I saw the perimeter of his face transform into rays of sunlight and then into a lions mane.

I asked: "who are you?"

He said; "Lion King. Sun King."

And that was it!

I learned nothing more of this Sun King/Lion King until August 2014 when I had another vision while in deep meditation.

This time a black panther came to me.

After receiving some guidance from the panther, I asked;

"How shall I know you?"

The panther replied, "Mika"

It wasn't until January 2015 that the pieces began to come together in over 10 months of undeniable downloads & synchronicity.

The journey has taken me to the wisdom of Egypt and the pyramids, South American and African Shamanism, to the White Lions of Timbavati and INTO the heart of what truly lives within each of us.

I have always believed Peace is Possible and when Lionhearted people unite, Peace is Possible in OUR lifetime.


Introducing MiKA:
The Malas with a LionHearted Mission

MiKA Malas is THE creative engine that will help me share the message of Lionheartedness.

When I created the malas and began to share them, I found they resonate with people of all different beliefs because the geometries are sacred symbols of UNITY. The symbols are not outside of ourselves. They ARE us.

The malas represent UNITY, Balance, Christ Consciousness, Creativity, Mastery, Magic, Peace, Infinite possibility . . . and more . . .and most of all, they represent the truth of who YOU are - the legacy of your Divinity.

I created these talismans to remind you and support you in your journey of remembering and embodiment.

Here are the first MiKA Mala designs


The Malas: Three sacred symbols come together on one pendant. The seed of life or solar mandala, the anahata or star of david and the royal lion. Every mala is created using 108 semi precious stones and wood beads.

The MiKA Mission: To create a global humanitarian community of highly creative, visionary Lionhearted People. We ARE powerful agents of positive change when we come together as #lionheartsinaction.  By collaborating with creative change agents, new feminine & masculine leaders, grass root and larger humanitarian organizations, we can bring fulfill our collective dream of World Peace. 

The Message: When Lionhearted People Unite - Peace is Possible.

Making a Difference: Every $77 MiKA Mala Perk will come in a reclaimed silk sari pouch!

MiKA is collaborating with "Made with a Purpose" and the pouches are made by 6 women in India that in turn, supports the women and children in their community with education and economic sustainability.

Global Campaigns #lionheartsinaction: In early spring,  MiKA Malas will launch the first campaign with a fresh creative & lionhearted focus on cultivating inner peace. The campaign will specifically focus on bringing awareness to our global epidemic around mental illness.


Through MiKA Malas, I Envision:


  • passionately sharing the message of Lionheartedness & Peace.
  • collaborating with creative leaders and humanitarians around the world.
  • building a global humanitarian community of #lionheartsinaction
  • speaking with women, teens and groups about mental health, emotional healing, cultivating inner peace and following your heart.
  • supporting projects that stop violence against women and children
  • meeting the White Lions in Timbavati, Africa, March 2016
  • writing my book of healing and transformation in 2016
  • world schooling my children to grow as empowered world citizens
  • being true to my desire for right livelihood (living simply in nature, being present with my two children, embracing the creative muse, making a difference)

Here's Where the Money Will Go:

  1. Pay my angel social media manager who saw the vision and said
    "how can I help?"
  2. Purchase a large supply of silk pouches from Made with a Purpose.
  3. Initiate the first global #lionheartsinaction campaign - mental health awareness
  4. Get a custom website to present the movement & handle online sales.
  5. Create the product information inserts 
  6. Buy beads, supplies and open for business!
  7. Order the metal pendants for the MiKA goddess line! Yummmmm
  8. Help cover some short term living costs so I can focus solely on MiKA.
  9. Pay for my flight and retreat fees to meet the White Lions in Africa, March 2016

What Happens if I Surpass My Goal?

If I surpass the funding goal, I will use these funds to invest back into MiKA Malas
so the business is sustainable long term:

  • Hire my social media manager to reach a global audience
  • Hire TWO people to help make malas /shipping.
  • hire a speaking coach
  • hire an accountant/bookkeeper
  • pay the tuition to for White Lion Leadership Academy Nov 2016.
  • create the 2nd campaign for #lionheartsinaction

What Happens If Don't Meet My Goal?

If I don't meet my goal, I will put everything from the campaign into building the MiKA Malas business. I trust that the vision came for a reason and the time of lionheartedness is upon us, so I will continue no matter what. <3

Risks & Challenges

IndieGoGo receives a 5% platform fee for hosting the campaign, so I have factored this into the desired campaign goal.

The challenges are the same with any start-up when the funds are tight. Lots of focus, dedication, patience, belief and connecting with like minded people. That's where YOU come in!!

8 Amazing Lionhearted Perks for YOU!
 

I believe  that we MUST follow our hearts. When we do, we free up the energy to serve the world in a way that feels true. I believe that creativity is ESSENTIAL to the SOUL. When we combine creativity with Leadership, we have unbounded amounts of energy and vision to offer the world.

Here they are:








Thank you so much for your support!!!!

Please remember to:


  • Share the campaign using the Indiegogo share tools on left of this page. The more comments and shares, the greater chance this campaign has of reaching a global audience. WOW!! Imagine that?!!
  • Add Your name to the Global Lion Hearted Community then watch for opportunities to make a difference by linking your creativity to larger vision for change. #lionheartsinaction

  • Enter to win one of the Mana Monday Instagram Giveaways!
    Find us on instagram @mikamalapride


Very Special Thank You's To . . .

Kat Bicket
Lisa Rummel
Jocelyn Podowski
Shawanda Rock Store
Carley Mattimore
Dawn from Zenwand
Christian Reiner
Harmony Starr
Leon Anthony
Lori Pinnell
all the beautiful people in my local and greater community
&
my greatest inspirations:
my little cub lions
Evan & Olivia

MiKA is collaborating with "Made with a Purpose" and the pouches are made by 6 women in India that in turn, supports the women and children in their community with education and economic sustainability. Global Campaigns #lionheartsinaction: In early spring,  MiKA Malas will launch the first campaign with a fresh creative & lionhearted focus on cultivating inner peace. The campaign will specifically focus on bringing awareness to our global epidemic around mental illness.

Through MiKA Malas, I Envision:


passionately sharing the message of Lionheartedness & Peace.
collaborating with creative leaders and humanitarians around the world.

building a global humanitarian community of #lionheartsinaction


speaking with women, teens and groups about mental health, emotional healing, cultivating inner peace and following your heart.
supporting projects that stop violence against women and children

meeting the White Lions in Timbavati, Africa, March 2016
writing my book of healing and transformation in 2016

world schooling my children to grow as empowered world citizens
being true to my desire for right livelihood (living simply in nature, being present with my two children, embracing the creative muse, making a difference)





  Here's Where the Money Will Go:



Pay my angel social media manager who saw the vision and said "how can I help?"

Purchase a large supply of silk pouches from Made with a Purpose.
Initiate the first global #lionheartsinaction campaign - mental health awareness

Get a custom website to present the movement & handle online sales. 
Create the product information inserts 
Buy beads, supplies and open for business!
Order the metal pendants for the MiKA goddess line! Yummmmm

Help cover some short term living costs so I can focus solely on MiKA.

Pay for my flight and retreat fees to meet the White Lions in Africa, March 2016


What Happens if I Surpass My Goal?If I surpass the funding goal, I will use these funds to invest back into MiKA Malas so the business is sustainable long term:
Hire my social media manager to reach a global audience

Hire TWO people to help make malas /shipping.

hire a speaking coach

hire an accountant/bookkeeper

pay the tuition to for White Lion Leadership Academy Nov 2016.
create the 2nd campaign for #lionheartsinaction


What Happens If Don't Meet My Goal?

If I don't meet my goal, I will put everything from the campaign into building the MiKA Malas business. I trust that the vision came for a reason and the time of lionheartedness is upon us, so I will continue no matter what. <3
  Risks & Challenges
IndieGoGo receives a 5% platform fee for hosting the campaign, so I have factored this into the desired campaign goal. The challenges are the same with any start-up when the funds are tight. Lots of focus, dedication, patience, belief and connecting with like minded people. That's where YOU come in!! 
  

8 Amazing Lionhearted Perks for YOU! 

I believe  that we MUST follow our hearts. When we do, we free up the energy to serve the world in a way that feels true. I believe that creativity is ESSENTIAL to the SOUL. When we combine creativity with Leadership, we have unbounded amounts of energy and vision to offer the world. 
Here they are:
















Thank you so much for your support!!!!
Please remember to: 


 
Share the campaign using the Indiegogo share tools on left of 
this page. The more comments and shares, the greater chance this 
campaign has of reaching a global audience. WOW!! Imagine that?!!


Add Your name to the Global Lion Hearted Community then watch for opportunities to make a difference by linking your creativity to larger vision for change. #lionheartsinaction


Enter to win one of the Mana Monday Instagram Giveaways!Find us on instagram @mikamalapride



Very Special Thank You's To . . . 

Kat BicketLisa RummelJocelyn PodowskiShawanda Rock StoreCarley MattimoreDawn from ZenwandChristian ReinerHarmony StarrLeon AnthonyLori Pinnellall the beautiful people in my local and greater community&my greatest inspirations:my little cub lionsEvan & Olivia

story:
Hello, My name is Tammy Dennis

Me and my family have had this idea for the past 5 years and never had the funds to follow through. We have been working on this idea for a long time and I have the know how, but could never take it to the next level. I never knew that there were websites like this that help make dreams come true. 

We want to open ColdStreets.Com to help the so many homeless people out in the streets by selling our shirts and other apparel worldwide. We will give a percentage of every sale to homeless shelters and soup kitchens to help feed people in need. We believe that no one should be cold and hungry and if we could make someones day just a little brighter that is something I want to be a part of. So we need your help to make this happen :) 

We need just about everything to get this started.  I have the website and the knowledge,  but the stuff needed is pricey to start.  I know once we get all set up there will be no stopping us from achieving our goals of continuously helping the needy. All of the people we would be able to help because of your generosity. I want to Thank You now from the bottom of my heart. For any help! even if it is just a simple share :) Tammy D.  

Check Out Our Awesome Perks :)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Perk 1  $5.00 

You Will Receive A Very Special Thank You From Me Via Email. 
Thank You For Your Support And Please Share Our Campaign With Your Friends :)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Perk 2  $10.00 

You Will Receive Two Of Our Bumper Stickers. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Perk 3  $15.00 

You Will Receive One Tote Bag And Two Of Our Bumper Stickers.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Perk 8  $250.00     

Pick Any 2 Perks Above And Your Name Will Also Be Put On Our Websites Contributor's Page. ( In Small Font )


Perk 9  $500.00     

Pick Any 4 Perks Above And Your Name Will Also Be Put On Our Websites Contributor's Page. ( In Medium Font )


Perk 10  $1,000.00     
Pick Any 8 Perks Above And Your Name Will Also Be Put On Our Websites Contributor's Page. ( In Large Font )


Perk 11  $5000.00 (Only One Spot Available)

You Will Have Your Name On The Top Of Our Websites Contributor's Page. ( In The Largest Font ) Now That's Cool :) You Will Also Receive 4 Hoodies And Be Able To Pick Any 16 Perk Variations You Wish Above.

xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Let's Make A Difference Together. 

Anything Is Possible If You Put Your Heart, Mind And Soul To Work. Thank You And Have A Wonderful Day :) 

Oh... And Remember To Share This With Your Friends, And Follow Us On Facebook,Twitter, Youtube And Instagram For Our Grand Opening Specials.

story:
I'm Kela Hunte a 34 year old Fort Myers native single, mother of 4. I started an Event planning & decorating service 7 seven months ago and became a licensed Insurance agent 1 month ago. And I’m currently in a financial crisis so I’m “Designing for Dollars”. My specialty is custom & unique events like parties, showers & custom decorations. And life & auto insurance, debt reduction and retirement planning. However, I will make a custom arrangement for you with a contribution of at least $30.

I have a professional experience spanning over 10 years in customer service & insurance. But April 2012 my oldest son which was 14 at the time got injured after losing control of his dirt bike and hitting the side of our neighbor’s house. And at the time of my son’s accident I was a Service Manager for a local branch of Cintas; where I had managed to get my family off welfare, out of an abusive relationship, into a gated community and payoff a car. But when Shad got hurt he was in the hospital for several months with me 24/7 at his bed side. Cintas let me go because I had missed 3 months of work and had no idea when I was going to be able to return to work. During that time Shad had been on Life support, life flight to Miami and later Gainesville because he suffered several complications including basically him ripping his brain in half, causing a close skull brain injury resulting in him having amnesia, abnormal brain activity because of the traumatic brain injury. He also crushed his femur in about 13 pieces and road rash to about 45% of his body, which later required plastic surgery. Ultimately, I didn’t work for over a year caring for him alone. Later, I managed to get a job working for a temp agency and later a local physician group in the insurance department. However, I was fired in March of 2015. After missing too much time from work, after my son had a black out and fell down stairs at school, re-breaking his leg requiring him to have his 3rd surgery in 3 years. To provide for my children I chose to use my hobby and passion as a source of income because that was my 2nd job I’ve lost since his accident. And Shad will like require a further surgery in the future and he still has 2 years of school left.

I'm currently working out of my garage trying to get started. Over the past 7 months I've done several events for mostly for my family and friends; but with what little money I had saved and the money I made I’ve bought tools, supplies to work with but it hasn’t netted me enough income to stay current on my bills. The electric is getting shut off every other month, I’ve been paying my rent and car payment in pieces and food stamps only buy uncooked food. I have 3 other children in school and have various school start and dismissals. My younger kids don’t meet the criteria for a bus and I can’t afford an after school program so I have to pick them up and drop daily. Shad has daily rehab in which I transport him to and from and gas alone is killing me. He can’t drive or work yet. But we’re gaining constantly so I have Hope he will one day. But between the 2 businesses I hardly ever sleep or eat much anymore. I’m not dating anyone so I don’t have the benefit of a spouse. However, now that they’re back in school I’m looking for a night job too.

Because I am a Christian and truly believe in God. My faith won’t allow me deceive anyone or do something wrong for money. And I didn’t panic because I’m believing God for a miracle in all this. But several people suggested me telling my story and creating a campaign to see if I could get some help.

I'm talented and I Love being able to be apart my clients special events. Event planning and decorating is truly my passion! And I’d rather earn my income than beg for it. But I’m stuck between this, winning the lottery or accept being homeless and take my kids to a shelter. Keeping me going allows me the opportunity to create my own success and be the Caregiver my family needs me to be. Because of my situation I want to help get families covered with the best insurance they can afford and celebrate as much as possible. Because if I had been properly protected my son’s accident though life changing and tragic my coverage would have protected me from financial ruin and devastation.

I'm currently in need of money to my past due rent of $1235, plus Oct rent. I need $900 to get my car out of repossession, $90 for me & Shad’s cell phone, $217 for the past due electric and household essentials. I share an office space with 2 photographer’s that are trying to help me get on my feet. But the office is in Cape Coral and I can’t afford the gas and tolls getting to from their office. They asked me to pay $75 a week for rent. But I can’t even do it. I was recently on TV being interviewed about my business and it got me a few calls but nothing in concrete yet.

My goal is to eventually, get current on my bills, invest in some marketing and launch a website and open a Store front location to use as an event venue and a place to mentor kids. Since I’m a single parent and have my kids all the time, I figure I can help other parents keep their jobs by helping them with their kids while they work. I believe with my Unquenchable thirst for success and relentless drive for Customer Satisfaction I can offer my community a one of a kind experiences and a business that will pay it forward and give back. If you can please share my story and help us it would be a blessing.

Here's my number and email please don't hesitate to contact me if you have more questions about us.  (239)850-3581  Keii.events365@gmail.com

Thanks again for any and all support . God bless

story:
Who Are We?

Pure Quality Productions, est. November 2008, provides audio visual and entertainment solutions for events in Canada's Maritimes. 

Our dedicated team of trained and experienced pros provide incomparable event performances, services, and experiences. We've got the knowledge, experience, equipment, and motivation to turn any celebration into a party.

We work to make every event the success our clients dream it to be. 

Let's Get You Up To Speed.

Pure Quality Productions, formerly Pure Quality DJ Services, was founded by 12-year-old Sam Eyland of Halifax, Nova Scotia in November 2008. During his younger years, Sam operated a myriad of home businesses - providing various services and products to family and friends. A favourite for Sam was the theatre he created in the family basement. On evenings and weekends Sam, with his sister and friends, would coordinate and perform short productions for their parents. In fall 2007, Sam was cast in a musical production; his sister was cast in another production for the same theatre. The theatre required parental participation, so Sam's father, Terry, with Sam in his shadow, ran the stage lighting for Sam's sister's production. In light of this experience, Sam was recruited by two grade 7 students to join the junior high school tech crew. Several months into junior high, Sam, with a new-found interest for disc jockeying and event promotion, founded Pure Quality DJ Services. On Monday, June 29th, 2009, Sam provided the company's first disc jockey service for $19.99 at a party. A year later, the company performed at five small parties, and entered the wedding industry, providing disc jockey services for two weddings. The following year, the company performed at eighteen events, increasing sales by approximately 300%. Through the remainder of junior high, Sam led the company to host various promotional events, expand the service roster, and through the mentorship of a local specialist, begin providing audio visual services to a variety of functions, hence the need for a name change. Since then, Pure Quality Productions has provided audio visual and disc jockey services to over 125 events.

Pure Quality Productions has grown to appreciate that successful business in the audio visual and disc jockey industries is only attainable by making events the success they should be. We have built our brand on knowledge, experience, and a commitment to perfecting hospitable interactions, proper operational procedures, and a great selection of well-performed music for disc jockey events.

What's next for Pure Quality Productions?

After seven years of operation, Pure Quality Productions needs to expand both locally and nationally to grow beyond our current stage. In 2015, we expect to lay the foundation for out of province expansion, allot significant finances and resources towards marketing and acquiring new assets and resources, publish our team (employee) guide, revisit our online presence and business plans, and take on several, new part-time team members.

As a 19-year-old entrepreneur, finding funding is difficult. I need your help to make my dream come true so that the dreams of many event hosts can become reality. Thank you very much for your support.

story:
Chestnut Street Baptist Church needs your help!

Due to harsh weather and the effects of time, the CSBC steeple has become structurally unsound.  Although safety issues have been avoided due to significant foundation and framing work, the steeple still requires extensive repairs.  Our church body has already contributed a significant portion towards this effort, but we can't do it all on our own.  We are asking for the community's help in saving this iconic town landmark.  Thank you for visiting this site and for any contribution you are able to make.

The landmark steeple in our 177-year-old building has been home to the Camden, Maine town clock since 1868. 

In the words of Camden architect Christopher Glass, "...The steeple is sited to be seen coming from the North, coming into the harbor, looking down from Mt. Battle, or coming out of the Post Office or Town Office.  It is the ornament of the village, the ultimate symbol of the New England landscape and the ultimate expression of the aspiration to God in the community."


Our membership has voted for complete renovation of the steeple and spire. 
The cost estimates for this project are as follows:
1.  Lower structural repair (basement to tower box):  $72,000
2.  Upper steeple structural repair (tower box to spire base):  $126,000
3.  Attic insulation:  $11,000
4.  Staging rental:  $101,000
5.  Exterior steeple renovation: $146,000
     a) Spire demolition
     b) New roofline trim, siding, and architectural detail work
     c) New trim for 3 stained glass windows and 4 louver openings
     d) Installation of new building wrap
     e) Installation of lead coated copper belfry floor
     f) Exterior painting
6.  New spire (includes crane and misc. framing):  $82,000

TOTAL ESTIMATED COST:  $538,000

  •      Work already paid for by the church: $85,000
  •      Work projected to be paid for by the church $100,000
  •      Total donations thus far: $99,650

    *** Remaining funds to be raised as of 09/06/2015: $253,350


____________________________________________


Our goal is to restore our steeple to its former beauty, to make it look exactly as it did the day after original construction and dedicate it for another 100 years to His Glory.  Please help us if you can.

For more information please visit our website at www.saveoursteeple.com

story:
Mission

Blended Social Club will carefully source our coffee beans from all over the world and roast them in-house to ensure the highest quality product.

Everything will be made from scratch, all fresh ingredient. Our goal is to provide the best coffee and the best food.

We want to build a space where people come together, feel welcome and enjoy great food and great coffee. We will be open late on the weekends and offer live acoustic music.

It will be the perfect place to come and just relax, do your homework, or to socialize with friends and family. We want everyone to be apart of our journey!!


What We Need

We still need to sign the lease, put down the security deposit, buy our equipment and build out the kitchen.

Equipment we need:

  • 12 Burner Stove W/ oven

  • Double Convection Oven

  • 55'' Deck Oven

  • Hood System

  • Insulated Proofing Cabinet

  • Dough Sheeter

  • Hobart 40 Qt. Floor Mixer

  • Diedrich Coffee Roaster

  • Coffee Equipment (espresso machine)

  • Refrigeration & Ice Machine

  • Dinnerware (cups,bowls,plates, silverware)

  • Tables & Chairs

  • Miscellaneous Kitchen Tools

The more we raise the more of a positive impact we can make on our community.  

Blended Social Club plans to have community involvement with donating time or money into community groups or non-profit organizations.                                                                        

                              


What You Get


                                                 

                             

                           

                            

                                              

                                  

                           

                                        



Risks & Challenges

 The biggest risk we face is competition. There are numerous food and coffee service businesses in the area. However majority of them close at about 9pm which leaves students and young adults no where to go to socialize or do homework. 
Thriving in the food service industry takes hard work, dedication, and commitment.
Our formula for success is quality food, good service, and great people.



Other Ways You Can Help

Weather it be sharing our project, contributing 10 cents or 10 dollars. Anything helps and we appreciate you!!! Also check us out on Facebook to stay updated.

story:
Unser Projekt

Wenn wir keine Worte finden, ist es meist schwer unseren Gedanken, Gefühlen, Ängsten und Erlebnissen Ausdruck zu verleihen. Um den Flüchtlingen die Integration zu erleichtern, wollen wir ihnen den Zugang zur deutschen Sprache durch ein einfaches Hilfsmittel ermöglichen: VISUELLE WÖRTERBÜCHER! Damit kann jeder selbstständig lernen, dieses individuell gestalten und es überall hin mitnehmen.

Das handliche "VISUELLE WÖRTERBUCH - Deutsch als Fremdsprache" beinhaltet Bilder mit den entsprechenden deutschen Vokabeln. Außerdem kann man auf einer Leerzeile selbstständig etwas dazuschreiben.

Uns, Elentári T. Nepomucky & ACE, liegt die Integration durch Sprache sehr am Herzen, da wir beide tagtäglich mit der Wichtigkeit gemeinsamer Sprache konfrontiert sind; Elentári in ihrer Tätigkeit als Creative Director, Physikerin und Nachhilfelehrerin & ACE als Autorin für Bücher und Filme.

Unser Ziel ist es, möglichst vielen Flüchtlingen ein VISUELLES WÖRTERBUCH direkt über ihre Wohnstätten zukommen zu lassen. Dafür brauchen wir Deine tatkräftige Unterstützung!

Deine Unterstützung

Derzeit haben wir Anfragen von Flüchtlingseinrichtungen der Caritas, der Diakonie, Don Bosco und Traiskirchen in der Höhe von 1.100 Wörterbüchern - Tendenz steigend. Um diesen Bedarf zu decken, benötigen wir 6.000 Euro.

Um diesen Betrag werden wir beim Dorling Kinderley Verlag in München die Bücher bestellen und diese über die Wohneinrichtungen direkt an die Flüchtlinge verteilen.

Wenn mehr bzw. weniger an Spenden zusammenkommen werden wir die Anzahl der Bücher entsprechend anpassen. Wir garantieren, dass jeder Cent in Form von VISUELLEN WÖRTERBÜCHERN bei den Flüchtlingen ankommt!

Nachhaltige Veränderung

Mit der Unterstützung der "Aktion: Wörterbuch" hilfst Du Flüchtlingen sich selbst zu helfen. Denn wenn sie unsere Sprache sprechen, können sie ein Teil unserer Gemeinschaft werden. Sie können ihre Fähigkeiten einbringen, uns an ihren Erfahrungen teilhaben lassen und unsere Kultur verstehen lernen.

Besonders gilt das für unbegleitete, minderjährige Flüchtlingskinder. Denn sie dürfen definitiv in Österreich bleiben und besuchen hier auch die Schule. Wie viel leichter würde ihnen die Ausbildung fallen, wenn sie den Unterricht verstehen?

Die VISUELLEN WÖRTERBÜCHER sind Hilfe zur Selbsthilfe für Flüchtlinge. Verändere Du ihre Lebensqualität!

Risiken & Herausforderungen

Die Bitten um VISUELLE WÖRTERBÜCHER erreichen uns aus ganz Österreich. Um eine einfache Logistik zu gewährleisten, arbeiten wir mit einem direkten Lieferadressen-System.

Da täglich mehr Menschen ihre Heimat in Richtung Europa verlassen, werden laufend neue VISUELLE WÖRTERBÜCHER gebraucht. Je höher die gesammelte Summe, desto mehr kommt uns der Verlag mit dem Stückpreis entgegen!

Wie Du noch helfen kannst

Bitte erzähle Deiner Familie, Deinen Freunden und Bekannten von der "Aktion: Wörterbuch". Das geht ganz einfach über die Share-Buttons bei Indiegogo.
Denn auch wenn unsere freie Zeit sehr knapp ist, kann so jeder einen Teil zur Integration beitragen!

story:
Stay Undercover

Outhaus is a young business with a passion for the great outdoors.

We already design and produce our own high quality camping products with established manufacturing partners. Our products have been extremely well received and we now dream of pushing on to the next level. We want to see our range sold throughout the UK and Europe and become a byword for quality, reliability and longevity. A small group of people (our existing customers) already know that. We want the world to know!

By helping us to grow you will be ensuring the success of a business that is intent on great customer service and a quality of product that is often not seen in our throw away society.

Fredlig Canvas Tarp

What We Need & What You Get

We need to place larger orders with our suppliers in order to get down to the costs required to provide great value alongside great quality. We work with factories that make product for some of the most respected brands around the globe and we know that we can expect the same for Outhaus. We know because they are already doing it for us.

Grand Solo Canvas Swag

We want to increase our offering and give our customers a choice from a bigger range of carefully considered, well engineered outdoor equipment.

Your contribution will allow us to give you great discounts on Outhaus branded products. These include:

  • Canvas Swags & Tents
  • 4x4 and Camper Awnings
  • Parachute Silk Hammocks
  • Canvas Tarps
Our range can be seen at www.outhausoutdoors.com. Please take a look and then come back here to take advantage of our Indiegogo discounts.

Halvor 15 Pull Out Awning

Outhaus has been seen in the following publications:
  • Land Rover Owner International
  • Bushcraft & Survival Skills
  • VW Bus T4 & T5+
  • Campervan
  • Volkswagen Camper & Commercial
  • Hayburner
  • Land Rover Monthly
And our canvas swags are currently travelling around the Andalusian mountains on the backs of Royal Enfield motorbikes with Legendary Motorcycle Adventures.

photo credit Olivia Bolesworth (LMA)

The Impact

We need funding to place larger orders and to ensure that we have a comprehensive range of product available. We know that our products are extremely well made and our customers love them but we need to grow faster. This campaign is giving us the opportunity to promote our brand and give our backers some rewards in return.

It is a bold plan for us because we are offering such massive discounts in exchange for exposure. These prices are unsustainable but we think it's worth the pain in order to bring our vision to a wider audience.

If we are unable to meet our sales targets and cannot fulfil orders of particular items, we promise to repay contributions so that you will not be out of pocket.

5m SIG Canvas Bell Tent

There are too many companies selling cheap, throwaway tents and the like. We want you to be using our products in many years to come, not just until next season. The outdoors is there for all of us. Let's not fill it with broken nylon tents but enjoy it from a quality canvas shelter.

Sven 20 Detachable Canopy

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute but you agree with our mission, please don't worry too much. If you could share our campaign amongst your friends via Facebook, Instagram and the like we'd appreciate it.

Thank you for reading our story. We truly hope to bring the Outhaus brand to the forefront and I personally thank you for helping us with our mission.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Carina. I'm a 25-year-old baker who just happens to be blind. Growing up in Connecticut, I learned great values from my parents and grandparents who left Sweden and Ireland to start new lives in New England. They turned uncertainty into productivity as they fought for their new homeland and started new businesses that became lasting legacies and enabled them to pass down treasured skills, talents, and recipes. We thrive on hospitality, a drive to push forward, and a love of food. I loved to be hands on and hands in everything edible, hiding away in the kitchen to make a new recipe to serve warm out of the oven at the end of a long day. As a teenager, I gained friends and supporters as I cranked out cookies and coffee cakes and sold them on my tricycle to prepare for my big dream of bakery ownership. My long-awaited entrance into pastry school, however, showed me the challenge of competing with my peers in an industry of speed, visual appeal, and conformity. Since then, I’ve been on a mission to share my passion while putting the ABILITY back in disability.

Now, with an MBA and a move to the land of creative thinkers in Portland, Oregon behind me, I am out to pursue my love of the artistic science of baking while building on the drive and pioneering spirit of my ancestors into a movement of change that even Portland needs. Nearly 1 in 5 people have some sort of challenge that we classify as a disability. They may live life with one leg missing, or might not be able to walk at all. They might be deaf or blind, or have a mental disorder that makes them talk and think a little differently. But that does not define a person or mark the end of our existence. Instead, it often makes us stronger. As a blind person, not only have I lived through three brain tumors and countless surgeries; but also I have to adapt every move to get around the every day. In the modern workplace, people who can innovate and work together in unique ways are the dream of every recruiter and manager, yet doors close for those of us accompanied by dog, cane, chair, or lisp. What better place to foster change than at the table, with the first burst of energy of the day. Now, my company, Carina’s Bakery, is opening our first retail store so that you can start your day with a smile, an inspirational story, and a taste of a plant-based treat made with heart.

Why plant-based you say? Well as a 6-year vegan myself, I can tell you each change you make that brings you closer to the earth and away from factory farms brings support back towards small farmers and environmental change. Plus, a plant-based diet opens doors to a rainbow of new flavors and nutrient you never knew existed. In a company that changes lives, why not make them and the furry and beloved companions around them a bit happier and healthier too?

What We Need & What You Get

With a team of driven employees, family, and friends ready to help and work for me, I am opening my first retail store in downtown Beaverton this fall. My history and upbringing will combine with learned science and business principles to create vegan treats you won’t believe.  In addition to creating jobs for uniquely abled people, hopefully it will draw you in to ponder a better, sweeter future as you sip a good brew and savor a tender pastry.

Whether you come into the store in person or buy our products online, customers of Carina's Bakery make way for growth of the business and it's ability to create more sweet things; new recipes and new story-filled souls being added to the company. For now, we will be four people strong, but I have a vision for a community of uniquely abled people sharing their skills and growing their ideas in a chain of bakeries and a community space for incubating a variety of businesses that showcase our passion and make better lives for us. We are all different, we are all abled, and we all have something uniquely and deliciously valuable to offer.

For your contribution, you'll be insuring lasting employment and fair wages for a physically challenged employee. Additionally, whatever level of funding we receive will grow the pot we can pull from for future growth. And your contribution has sweet rewards! You will get to taste what passion tastes like when you don't have to rush or conform to the norm; when you are friendly to the environment and to the heart.

The Impact

Nearly 1 in 5 people have some kind of disability. Therefore to even classify and separate out such things as to constrain and define an individual's abilities is sad and should be fought against. Supporting this project means to embrace and overcome challenges- whatever size and prominence they take in our lives- and to enjoy everything to the fullest. I once created a baking program to train teenagers and young adults with abusive or broken childhoods and saw a similar effect that acceptance, collaboration and nurturing empowerment takes. 

Risks & Challenges

No one knows what tomorrow will bring, so we have to embrace, live and fight for our dreams today. I might be young, but I have business principles, family, and a community of people behind me, and I want you to be a part of it. It takes a different approach, a dedication of more time, and a love of the craft to make these treats come out day after day, but there is nothing else I'd rather do!

Other Ways You Can Help

This venture is about listening, tasting, believing and acting. I appreciate you taking the time to listen to my story and ask you to share it with everyone you know so that we can increase the opportunities for the most driven among us. And next time you sit down to a cup of coffee and a pastry, take a moment to think whose story went into it.

story:
Food Wasted




We always thought our agriculture system is inefficient and unsustainable.Future Proteins is our solution to this problem.

Beef require 10 kg or more of feed to produce 1 kg of meat,pork need 5 kg,insects need 1.75 kg or less.They have a much better food conversion ratio than all meat we produce.Insects need 100x less water and produce 20-60 times less methane than conventional meat production.

At the same time we can help reduce billions tons of food waste generated each year.

Our goal is to launch a line of dried insect and high protein flour.We want to make people aware that insect protein is a viable alternative to meat.



Funds will be used to start our 1 st insect farm.It is designed to be implanted easily anywhere to reduce waste while producing insects.



This is more than a business for us,we want to change the world eats and use resources.

Like any projects there are risks but we have a solid plan and have years of experience as business owners,so we are ready to tackle them.If for any reasons the project is delayed,we ll keep our backers posted about it.

Beef require 10 kg or more of feed to produce 1 kg of meat,pork need 5 kg,insects need 1.75 kg or less.They have a much better food conversion ratio than all meat we produce.Insects need 100x less water and produce 20-60 times less methane than conventional meat production.
At the same time we can help reduce billions tons of food waste generated each year.
Our goal is to launch a line of dried insect and high protein flour.We want to make people aware that insect protein is a viable alternative to meat.
Funds will be used to start our 1 st insect farm.It is designed to be implanted easily anywhere to reduce waste while producing insects.
This is more than a business for us,we want to change the world eats and use resources.
Like any projects there are risks but we have a solid plan and have years of experience as business owners,so we are ready to tackle them.If for any reasons the project is delayed,we ll keep our backers posted about it.

story:
Short Summary

In the East African region, Uganda is ranked 2nd to Tanzania in the production of common beans but only exports 20% as most smallholder farmers can’t access lucrative international markets due to low quality yields. Rural farmers lack both reliable and cost efficient inputs such as fertilizers, seeds and guaranteed profitable markets for their output. In many countries, such farmers could become more marginalized as larger firms become increasingly necessary for a profitable operation.

Farmers sorting their produce before grading

Jay Fortune an agribusiness/export agency together with its client BerGida STI Turkey introduced for the first time in Uganda the flat white bean seeds in October 2015 to increase production and ship the dried white beans in containers to Turkey for further processing.  The flat white is a high yielding bean which is mainly used by the bean canning industry abroad. 

Bergida (Buyer) wants to import from Jay Fortune (Exporter) 1,300 metric tons of beans into Turkey during the 1st year of production for canning.  Jay Fortune will work with 1,400 smallholder farmers (producers) that can grow, produce the volumes and meet quality standards proposed by the buyer through a Contract Farming Model in Sironko district. Our Contract Farming Model will provide linkages that offer an important way in which smaller producers can farm in a commercial way at an agreed pre-determined price. 1,300MTs is equivalent to 57 containers (20feet).

In the 2nd year, each farmer will recruit 1 farmer to double the number of farmers to 2,800 and increase production to 2,600MTs and increase gradually up-to the 3rd year with 4200 farmers producing 3,900MTs the processor needs every year.  The aim of this project is to increase incomes of smallholders living under $1 a day by scaling up white bean production for the export market.

Project Description

One (1) farmer growing white beans on 1acre plot will produce 1000kgs of beans (in 2 seasons, equivalent to 1Ton) and will earn $690 annually.

Table showing yields and incomes per 1 farmer

Seed planted (Kg) per 1 farmer

Average Yield Per Kg

Total harvested yield/season

Price Per Kg

Total paid to farmer per season

Total paid to a farmer per year

10

50kgs per 1kg

500kgs

$0.69

$0.69 x 500kgs = $345

2 seasons x $345 = $690

$690 earning is an increment for a farmer living under $1/day to $1.8/day which shows an 80% increase in the cost of living which is very good performance.

Support Smallholders with a $50 seed capital (Farmers Agricultural Kit (FAK)

As mentioned earlier, poor yields make it difficult to raise high quality export volumes requested by international buyers which impacts negatively on the incomes of smallholder farmers.  Jay Fortune came up with a Farmers Agriculture Kit that will support smallholder farmers with key agriculture inputs that will enhance increased yields and meet buyer’s volumes.

The kit consists of;

·  10 kgs of seed for 1 acre plot costs ($10)

·  1 bag of NPK fertilizer costs ($21)

·  1 plastic drying sheet costs ($13)

·  6 Purdue Improved Crop Storage Bags ($6)

Total $50

A $50 seed capital will enable a smallholder purchase a Farmers Agriculture Kit (FAK) to produce a good quality export crop.  After harvest, he will deduct the $50 and donate it to the farmer he recruited in the 3rd year until the maximum tonnage is reached.

Brief on Jay Fortune

Jay Fortune founded in 2008 is among the top 5 agribusiness agencies exporting dry beans grown by smallholder farmers in Uganda to international markets. We export and source international markets for smallholder farmers produce who can meet stringent standards, volumes and consistency.

Impact

·  In the 1st year, the Agriculture kit will raise 1400 white bean farmers’ incomes from 0 to $690/year. $690 earning is an increment for a farmer living under $1/day to $1.8/day which shows an 80% increase in the cost of living of a smallholder.

·  57 containers (1 container carries 23 metric tons) of white beans will be shipped in the 1st year of production amounting to 1,300 Metric tons.

·  1400 farmers who received the $50 kit in the 1st year are expected to donate $50 to the next batch of 1400 farmers in the 2nd year. Total number of farmers in the 2nd year doubles 2800 farmers producing 2,600 metric tons.

·  113 containers will be shipped in the 2nd year of production, with an increased income for 2800 farmers

·  In the 3rd year, farmers will triple to 4,200.  The 1400 farmers who received kits in the 2nd year will donate to another 1400 farmers in the 3rd year. Production in the 3rd year will increase to 3,900 metric tones which is our targeted annual volume supply for the Turkish processor.

·  170 containers will be shipped in the 3rd year (3900 tons / 23 tons)

Long-term impact: 4200 farmer’s incomes will be increased to $690/year.  If the same farmers produce the white beans for a period of 5 years (per renewable contract), it means a farmer will receive $3,450 in the next 5 years with an increase in foreign currency of $2,898,000.  This change will be brought about by you if you can support a farmer with $50 seed capital to purchase the agriculture kit that will enable them produce a good quality export white bean crop.  The kit is a revolving fund kit which makes this whole project sustainable and out rightly minimizes on donor dependency. HELP US RAISE $70,000 TO KICK-START AND GO ALL THE WAY TO IMPROVE NOT ONLY A LIFE, BUT AN ENTIRE FARMERS FAMILY.

Budget:  Other project cost activities i.e. farmers selection, training workshops on crop management, postharvest handling, surveys, capacity building, monitoring etc will be met by Jay Fortune. 


Risks & Challenges

·  The risk is failing to raise $70,000 to purchase the Farmers Agriculture Kit and produce 1,300 MTs in the 1st year. If the funds we receive don’t reach the entire goal of 1,400 farmers, we shall keep looking for support funds to inject in our $70,000 farmers agriculture kit revolving fund.  But it won’t stop us from beginning, if we have raised kits of over 500 farmers, we will still start and progress slowly to show the Buyer that we are ready and committed to perform.

·  In-case of over production, we plan to sell the extra tons of beans to the local markets. Jay Fortune realizes that if farmers can sell their surplus production, this will as well improve incomes and food security.

·  Another risk is side selling by farmers to local traders.  We will minimize this risk by ensuring that each farmer commits himself through contract signing and follows the rules and regulations that will be embedded in the contract.  Also, we plan involve village leaders who will be part of our field extension networking.  Constant monitoring of farmers and gardens will also lessen this risk.

Other Ways You Can Help

Support our work on face-book page using this link by liking us:

https://www.facebook.com/www.jayfortune.co.ug

story:
Short Summary

Our project has in its core the idea of exploring at its best every costs-free public treasures, natural resources of the area and share it with the travelers who get here. Cerveteri is surrounded by seaside, lakes, thermal baths, woods, the largest Etruscan necropolis, port city and Rome.

The ingredients of our team to achieve our purpose are the good knowledge of all the surroundings, our time and energy, the love for this place and the great desire to share it with others.

We've organized every detail in order to make this possible: we put the bases for a cultural association which involves all the outdoor and indoor activities, wine tours, trips, cooking with and for our guests. We want it this way because we don't sell anything but we offer, we get together people from around the world with same passions, believes and appreciation for genuine life style.

Our activities are about awakening personal resources, rebounding with nature and strengthen more social contacts. What makes us grateful is that all this is still out there, ready to be lived and nourished, free of charge as it always has been.

This is why we came up with one simple equation: we've been given by the generosity of this lands, we'll share further with others, our guests will offer us at the end of their vacation here whatever they trust it's worth.


What We Need & What You Get

To get started, to put this equation on its track, we need material support 22,000 USD that will be used to get the proper guest house, the safe car to transport our guests around, airport back and forth. 

11,000 euro - buy the safe car big enough to carry 7 persons at a time. all taxes included;

11,000 euro - the furniture for 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom,  1 kitchen, 1 garden.

Due to the nature of our project we think that the best way to reward your generosity is to make you part of it. We will be more than happy to get in contact with every single contributor and let you choose from all our activities and services what suites you best for your personalized vacation.

Our services and activities for you are:

- hosting

- lunches, dinners, cooking together local recipes, specific italian food

- picnics

- wine tours

- thermal baths tours

- guided forest walks

- seaside walks

- museum visits and etruscan necropolis tours

- trips to all the medieval conserved towns around

- participation of all the local hollidays, traditional antique celebrations

- transport from airport Fiumicino back and forth

- transport from Civitavecchia city port back and forth

- guided trips to Rome, best informed, most authentic original places

and many more.

The Impact

At some point on anyone's path it comes that moment when settling down, feeling good with your life and yourself isn't enough. It grows on you the need to create, to share, to be a part of a larger whole, larger than friends and neighbors. From this strong need our project took birth. We imagined a human web, connecting one with other, sharing experiences, memories together, spreading world wide like the virtual communities that invaded our lives. From their success we understood how much people still need to connect with each other and we strongly feel that is not enough  to write to each other, to phone-talk to each other, but to really see each other.

This is why your understanding and your support for us will mean also that it is worth trying. Our purpose is to host our guests as a family that gets back together, not just for the precious beauty of nature for the eyes to see but for the human warmth for the soul to feel.

    Risks & Challenges

    Not sure how to put this, but there are no risks. We live here exactly the way we've talked you about, we grow little by little for the possibilities to come. This campaign is about wanting to do it at a bigger scale, for more people to inspire. As we all know, traveling is about getting richer inside, and all our experience and our professions brought us to make free choices about where and how to invest our time, energy, love and knowledge.

    The real challenge is finding out how many people it will reach our idea of putting on track the equation of sharing instead of selling, and being offered instead of getting payed for the services.

    If the campaign won't reach its money goal, we will use every single penny to continue what we're already doing. And we'll be here for our guests to have their perks anyway. With the difference that will use our old car which is not very big or comfortable, and we will receive them in our home, one at a time, because there is only one guest bedroom.

    Thank you all so much for the time you've dedicated to check our campaign. We assure you that for us it's been a challenge already trying our best to express in English how we think, who we are. the video also is too long maybe, but we really really wanted to do it by ourselves, home made, grateful for the opportunity to learn more and more about ourselves and new situations.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      And a special thank you for anyone who will feel that our idea is worth being spread, or get inspiration of. We'll be happy to here from you too.

story:
Summary

Thank you for your interest in supporting Fiddlehead Tours & Adventures, I am Sarah Grainger, owner and manager of Fiddlehead Tours & Adventures. My passion for the outdoors and sustainable living combined with my education and international/national adventure program experience has finally come together in my new company. My drive to make Fiddlehead become a company model that expands and provides economic growth for many communities starts in the Pacific Northwest. 

What we offer -

Fiddlehead is the only all-inclusive day tour and adventure company located in Bellingham WA. running tours in the beautiful Pacific Northwest. In small groups, participants experience  exquisitely curated tours connecting the best farm to table restaurants, breweries, vineyards, shopping, local events and outdoor activities. We use bikes, boats and our feet to get us from one place to another and have a support vehicle for the added safety and security. Small groups allow for a flexible and customizable experience both in planning and on tour. We take care everything and ensure that booking with us, participants wont need to wonder if they saw the best the community has to offer. 

Why it is important -

Patronizing local business allows Fiddlehead to show off the exceptional culture and people in the area while stimulating local economy by keeping the money spent in the community, in the community. Staying local ensures high quality food and authentic experiences.  Holistic Commodity Tourism is the definition of Fiddlehead and the type of tourism we are. This means that all aspects of the company from what and how we pay our employees, the companies with whom we partner with and the methods in which we get from one place to another benefit both our natural and economic environment. Holistic Commodity Tourism is the business model that we hope to grow and provide economic benefits in communities around the world. 

With your help, we can start a business that will increase economic prosperity while participants have the time of their life. Please help me provide jobs and adventure. 

What We Need 

  • Sustainable wages for employees while the company gets started! This is huge to us and the biggest need. We will have three staff on every tour: The bike guide, photographer and myself handling logistics and driving the support vehicle. We are asking $10,000 to keep everyone working and paid during start up time.
  • We are asking for $1,500 for website related costs.
  • Annual memberships that include on line and print advertising.
  1. $300 - %1 for the planet
  2. $175 - Sustainable Connections
  3. $360 - Chamber  of Commerce
  4. $300 - Bellingham Visitors Bureau
  • To provide high quality experiences at close to no waste we will provide water bottles, re-usable plates, silverware and napkins for the guests on tour. We are asking  $500 these materials. 
  • Bike supplies and first aid kits -$500
  • Marketing materials and paraphernalia - $1500 
  • Total support needed - $15,117

The Impact

With your contribution good jobs are being created and sustainable communities strengthened. Fiddlehead, can build a company and business model that can be taught and utilized by communities in need of economic growth through tourism.  Plus - there will be amazing and fun tours to experience! 

Risks & Challenges

Starting a new business is tough and trying to do it all is brutal. Friends and family and have been amazing and supportive and I cant thank them enough for it. I have run outdoor programs internationally, worked sales and marketing for a large company and spent the last 8 years working ski patrol and managing night events on mountain tops. Every job I have ever had, I have worked my up very quickly as I have a passion for hard work. 

My biggest challenge - I am better outside running and creating programs than I am good at computer related tasks. I need help with this and my additional staff will create the perfect team.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • While supporting me through financial contribution is great, helping me get the word out is even better. Please pass along this campaign if you think of anyone else who can help.
  • Coming soon -An incentive program in place for referrals.

story:
English here


Personas con ahorros que invierten en personas con ideas

Inversionate es una FinTech (empresa Financiero Tecnológica) que implementa el modelo de préstamos entre personas (Peer to Peer Lending) para facilitar el encuentro entre quienes acuden al mercado financiero solicitando financiación con quienes se encuentran en la búsqueda de rentabilizar sus ahorros.

Inversionate conecta ambas partes, brindando toda la información necesaria para que inversores y prestatarios tomen las decisiones pertinentes y facilitando todos los mecanismos para que el proceso de inversión y financiación sea sencillo y transparente.


¿Cómo funciona?

Invertir es muy fácil...


Solicitar un préstamo también es sencillo...


La plataforma tecnológica

Estamos trabajando fuerte para completar la plataforma y necesitamos tu ayuda para hacerlo rápido!


El futuro es ahora, el futuro es colaborativo

Nuestra meta como empresa es lograr generar impacto social sostenido. Queremos ayudar a las personas a cumplir sus sueños y alcanzar sus objetivos.

Para ello, nos hemos planteado como objetivos a corto plazo, mejorar la inclusión financiera en la región mediante la democratización en el acceso al financiamiento e inversiones, y ayudar en la educación financiera permitiéndole a cualquier persona invertir de forma segura aunque no cuente con conocimientos previos.

Lograr estos objetivos a corto plazo será la base para alcanzar nuestros objetivos a largo plazo de convertirnos en la empresa líder en Latinoamárica que define el Estado del Arte del P2P Lending y ser la plataforma más grande del rubro en la región, ayudando a su vez a los gobiernos a definir políticas para generar confianza en el modelo.


Con tu Ayuda

El dinero recaudado será destinado a:

  • Completar el Desarrollo de la primer versión operativa de la plataforma tecnológica
  • Generar la documentación legal necesaria para comenzar a operar
  • Capital operativo hasta alcanzar nuestro punto de equilibrio

Hemos elegido el tipo de recaudación flexible, ya que el proyecto se llevará a cabo, incluso si no juntamos el total del dinero mediante esta campaña en Indiegogo, con dinero que obtendremos de otras fuentes de financiación. Es por esto que te puedes quedar tranquilo que si colaboras, recibirás tu recompensa.


Nuestras Recompensas

Puedes ayudarnos optando por alguna de las recompensas:


Nuestro Plan


Hacia dónde vamos...


Riesgos y Desafíos

Todo en esta vida conlleva riesgos, y una de las claves del éxito es saber gestionarlos correctamente.


Nuestro Equipo


Nos apoyan

    


Inversionate en los medios


Si no puedes contribuir, aún puedes ayudar!

Si te ha gustado Inversionate, nuestra idea te parece genial o te sientes identificado con lo que estamos tratando de lograr, por favor ayudanos con la difusión:

  • Pídele a tus amigos y familia que corran la voz y hagan un poco de ruido sobre Inversionate.
  • Usa los botones de Indiegogo para compartir en redes sociales y que tus amigos y familia se enteren de Inversionate.

Muchas gracias por tu apoyo!

English


People with savings investing in people with ideas

Inversionate is a FinTech company that implements the Peer to Peer Lending model to facilitate the encounter of people seeking funding with those in search of a return on their savings.

Inversionate connects both sides, providing all the necessary information for investors and borrowers to take appropriate decisions and make all arrangements in order to make the investment and financing process simple and transparent.


How does it work?

Making an investment is very easy...


Requesting a loan is very easy too...


The technological platform

We are working hard to complete the platform and we need your help to do it fast!


The future is now, the future is sharing

Our goal as a company is to generate sustained social impact. We want to help people to fulfill their dreams and achieve their goals.

To do this, we have set as short term objectives, to improve financial inclusion in the region through democratization in the access to loans and investments, and to help in financial education allowing anyone to invest safely even without prior knowledge.

Achieving these short term objectives will be the basis for achieving the long term ones of becoming the lead company that defines the state of the art in P2P Lending and the largest platform in the category in South America, in addition to helping governments of the region to define policies to build confidence in the model.


With your help

The money raised will be used to:

  • Complete the development of the first operational version of the technological platform
  • Generate the necessary legal documentation before starting to operate
  • Operating capital until we reach our breakeven

We chose the flexible goal, since the project will be carried out even if the goal of this Indiegogo campaign is not reached, with money we will get from other funding sources. That is why you can rest assured that if you collaborate, you will receive your reward.


Our Perks


Our Plan


Where we are heading...


Risks and Challenges

Everything in life has risks, and one of the keys to success is knowing how to manage them properly.


Our Team


Supported by

    


Featured on


If you cannot contribute, you can still help!

If you liked Inversionate and our idea or you feel identified with what we are trying to achieve, please spread the word out:

  • Ask your friends and family to spread the word and make some noise about Inversionate.
  • Use Indiegogo's share on social networks buttons and let your friends and family know about Inversionate.

Thank you for your support!

story:
We are Ted and Stacy Anderson; parents to two boys, ages 4 and 6.  We have felt the need for an indoor play option in the west Metro.  So began our journey to create InnerActive, an outdoor playground brought inside.  

We are close to locking down a location, and would love your help to get us up and running!  We are planning to include a separate area for toddlers, with a generous space for them to play.  Also included will be a large playground, a jumper, creative play areas, and sports fields.  To make this the perfect place for your next birthday party, we have included a party room.

InnerActive’s basic focus is children’s play and fitness for 1 to 12-year old children. We are providing a parental-supervised safe, clean, climate-controlled environment for children to exercise and have fun while stimulating their imagination and challenging them physically.  The indoor playpark is based on the premise that if you set a large number of children inside a safe, imaginative play area, they are going to have fun.  They are also going to develop basic motor skills, social skills, muscle tone and self-confidence.  Parents can also enjoy hours of close interaction with their children in a safe, secure, and stimulating environment.

We will base InnerActive’s appeal on providing a stimulating indoor environment for children to play in, while adhering to the strictest quality control standards emphasizing excellence in service, safety, security, sanitation, cleanliness, and creativity.  Furthermore, we are dedicated to the continual development of creative themes and interactive designs that have entertainment and educational value which will ensure our competitiveness and success in the family entertainment market years into the future.


InnerActive will consist of:

·  A play structure for children ages 2-12

·  A padded tiny-tots area for children 3 and under

·  A kangaroo jumper

·  A half size basketball court 

·  A turf lined ‘soccer field’ 

·  An area for building blocks and imaginative play. 

Also included will be cafeteria-style seating with a variety of vending machines.  Food will be welcomed in this area, from outside sources, or from available vending machines; but will be restricted throughout the rest of the park.  All areas will have flooring recommended for the play structure. 

For family celebrations, such as birthdays and special occasions, we will offer a private party room. This room will be available for our customers as a self-serve party room.  They will be able to bring in the items they would like for their event.  If a pre-planned party is preferred, we will have birthday party packages available at a per-head cost, which will include decorations, food and beverages, cake, and entrance fee into the park.
